entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 11.
